name: deep-learning
description: Comprehensive deep learning expertise: neural network theory, architecture design, training diagnostics, research translation, mathematical foundations, and practical skills

agents.name: neural-architecture-engineer
agents.description: Neural architecture specialist for deep learning design and training strategies across multiple frameworks (Flax, Equinox, Haiku, PyTorch)

agents.name: neural-network-master
agents.description: Deep learning theory expert specializing in mathematical foundations, optimization theory, training diagnostics, research translation, and pedagogical explanations

skills.name: neural-network-mathematics
skills.description: Mathematical foundations for neural networks (linear algebra, calculus, probability, optimization, information theory)

skills.name: training-diagnostics
skills.description: Systematic diagnosis and resolution of training issues (gradient problems, loss curves, convergence analysis)

skills.name: research-paper-implementation
skills.description: Framework for translating research papers into working implementations

skills.name: model-optimization-deployment
skills.description: Model optimization (quantization, pruning, distillation) and deployment strategies

skills.name: neural-architecture-patterns
skills.description: Design patterns and best practices for neural architectures (CNNs, RNNs, transformers)

skills.name: deep-learning-experimentation
skills.description: Experiment design, hyperparameter tuning, ablation studies, and reproducible research
